attributes.name: Strength
attributes.summary: Resilient and determined through any challenge.
attributes.descriptionLong: I face difficulty with resolve and endurance, applying consistent effort until the work is complete. My strength lies not in force, but in persistence.

notes.note: Demonstrates resilience and steady effort in adversity.

attributes.name: Dexterity
attributes.summary: Adaptable and responsive, learning to stay flexible under pressure.
attributes.descriptionLong: I adapt quickly to shifting situations and learn through experience. When tension heightens, I sometimes stiffen, but awareness helps me stay fluid and composed.

notes.note: Adjusts quickly but works on maintaining flow under stress.

attributes.name: Constitution
attributes.descriptionLong: Physically and mentally, I maintain balance through challenges. My resilience allows me to stay grounded and recover quickly when faced with stress or uncertainty.

notes.note: Maintains composure in difficult or draining situations.

attributes.name: Intelligence
attributes.summary: Analytical and thoughtful; values clarity and depth.
attributes.descriptionLong: I think analytically and aim for precise understanding. I prefer reflection and structure, which helps me solve problems thoroughly, though I can move slower under time pressure.

notes.note: Uses structured thinking to find effective solutions.

attributes.name: Wisdom
attributes.summary: Intuitive and grounded perspective shaped by reflection.
attributes.descriptionLong: My experiences foster empathy and understanding. I value self-awareness and nuance, often bridging differences through insight and compassionate listening.

notes.note: Sees complex issues with nuance and empathy.

attributes.name: Charisma
attributes.summary: Warm and approachable; developing confident assertiveness.
attributes.descriptionLong: I connect naturally with people through warmth and authenticity. Building stronger assertiveness skills helps me express needs clearly and maintain balance in relationships.

notes.note: Friendly and empathetic, gaining confidence in direct expression.

skills.name: Responsibility
skills.summary: Strengthening ownership in daily habits and decisions.
skills.descriptionLong: By taking ownership of my actions and staying consistent in small routines, I build reliability and self-trust. Accountability improves my follow-through and focus.

notes.note: Practices consistency and accountability through daily efforts.

skills.name: Perspective
skills.summary: Curious about diverse viewpoints and values balance in understanding.
skills.descriptionLong: I seek to understand multiple perspectives before drawing conclusions. My curiosity and open-mindedness deepen empathy and shape balanced insight.

notes.note: Approaches the world through curiosity and balance.

skills.name: Allies & Companions
skills.summary: Invested in building trust and openness in relationships.
skills.descriptionLong: I cultivate supportive relationships built on shared honesty. Allowing vulnerability strengthens trust and enriches connection with those around me.

notes.note: Applies vulnerability to deepen trust with close allies.

skills.name: Meditation
skills.summary: Uses daily mindfulness to stay centered and clear-minded.
skills.descriptionLong: Meditation anchors me in calm and clarity. It helps me manage stress, recharge focus, and maintain emotional balance in daily life.

notes.note: Meditation reinforces focus and balanced presence.

strategies.name: Responsibility Path
strategies.summary: Own small actions, seek solutions, and reflect for steady growth.
strategies.descriptionLong: By taking accountability for even the smallest actions, I reduce blame and increase presence. Continuous reflection turns everyday behavior into intentional progress.

notes.note: Own actions ¬∑ Find solutions ¬∑ Reflect for growth.

strategies.name: Perspective Path
strategies.summary: Explore varied worldviews and refine inner principles.
strategies.descriptionLong: Learning from diverse perspectives builds clarity and humility. Every contrast reveals new values and deepens understanding of what guides me.

notes.note: Engage diversity to reveal truth and strengthen empathy.

strategies.name: Thrive Mode Ritual
strategies.summary: Daily meditation, mindful breaks, timely work, and calm closure.
strategies.descriptionLong: A balanced daily rhythm sustains my focus and peace. Centering practices, steady pauses, and early rest keep me in a grounded, thriving state.

notes.note: Simple habits maintain clarity and balance each day.
